description: Searches for documents in the Azure Search index.

searchnextpageparameters.description: Continuation JSON payload returned when Azure Search can't return all the requested results in a single Search response. You can use this JSON along with @odata.nextLink to formulate another POST Search request to get the next part of the search response.

value.description: The sequence of results returned by the query.

searchfacets.description: The facet query results for the search operation, organized as a collection of buckets for each faceted field; null if the query did not include any facet expressions.

client_request_id.description: The tracking ID sent with the request to help with debugging.

odatanextlink.description: Continuation URL returned when Azure Search can't return all the requested results in a single Search response. You can use this URL to formulate another GET or POST Search request to get the next part of the search response. Make sure to use the same verb (GET or POST) as the request that produced this response.

odatacount.description: The total count of results found by the search operation, or null if the count was not requested. If present, the count may be greater than the number of results in this response. This can happen if you use the $top or $skip parameters, or if Azure Search can't return all the requested documents in a single Search response.

searchcoverage.description: A value indicating the percentage of the index that was included in the query, or null if minimumCoverage was not specified in the request.

search_request.description: The definition of the Search request.
